    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3539</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3539</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Construïm instruments</string>
            <string language="en">Building musical instruments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufbauende Musikinstrumente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Instruments musicaux de construction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrumentos musicais construindo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strumenti musicali di costruzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χτίζοντας μουσικά όργανα</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Informació sobre el taller de construcció d'instruments amb materials de reciclatge realitzat amb l'alumnat de Cicle Inicial i tercer del CEIP Joan Coret de Badalona.</string>
            <string language="en">Information on a workshop for building instruments with recycled 'waste'. The project was carried out by pupils from the first and last years of Joan Coret Primary School in Badalona.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">música instrumental</string>
            <string language="en">instrumental music</string>
            <string language="es">música instrumental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació musical</string>
            <string language="en">music education</string>
            <string language="es">educación musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">instrument musical</string>
            <string language="en">musical instrument</string>
            <string language="es">instrumento musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen über eine Werkstatt für 
Gebäudeinstrumente mit aufbereiteter ' Vergeudung '. Das 
Projekt wurde bis zum Pupillen von der ersten und letzten Jahren Joan 
Coret der Primärschule in Badalona durchgeführt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'information sur un atelier pour des instruments
de bâtiment avec la 'perte 'réutilisée. Le projet a été mis
à exécution par des pupilles dès la début et des dernières 
années d'école primaire de Joan Coret dans Badalona.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informação em uma oficina para instrumentos do 
edifício com ' desperdício recycled '. O projeto foi realizado
pelas pupilas do primeiras e por últimos anos da escola preliminar de
Joan Coret em Badalona.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni su un workshop per gli strumenti 
della costruzione con 'spreco 'riciclato. Il progetto è stato 
effettuato entro le pupille dal prime e gli anni scorsi della scuola 
primaria di Joan Coret in Badalona.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πληροφορίες για ένα εργαστήριο για την οικοδόμηση των 
οργάνων με τα ανακυκλωμένα "απόβλητα". Το πρόγραμμα 
εκτελέσθηκε από τους μαθητές από τα πρώτα και τελευταία έτη 
σχολείου πρωτοβάθμιας εκπαίδευσης του Joan Coret badalona.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">instrumentelle Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikinstrument</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musique instrumentale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">instrument musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">música instrumental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrumento musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musica strumentale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strumento musicale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οργανική μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσικό όργανο</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
